description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Movements' that manages inventory movement entries, including creation, approval, and display of movements. It interacts with an API to load data, create new movements, and approve existing ones, rendering a user interface for inventory movement management.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches inventory items and movement data from the API and updates component state.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new inventory movement entry via the API and reloads data.

methods.name: approve
methods.description: Approves a specific movement entry by sending a request to the API.
